You will make progress on the current WCS Product sprint by working on your assigned tasks in order to improve your understanding of teamwork and troubleshooting in software engineering.

You will review concepts by commenting on your classmates 'fake news' images, consolidating info from your videos, looking at another example of abstraction, and playing a game in order to prepare yourself to show evidence of understand the standards.
You will show evidence of your understanding by taking a test and live coding together in order to make connections between your various programming experiences.
for 1/2 a test grade: complete the following by end of class today
get in groups like this: Group1 = TD, BS, CM ... Group2 = LF, AF, ME ... Group3 = AT, AL, GG
read the Practice PT guide together. discuss any questions. you will write the 'written response' part on your own for homework tonight
read and complete the Group Planning Guide together

read how to combine your code in Lesson 10 #3
combine your code into one account (the one mentioned at the bottom of the Group Planning Guide) on this page: Lesson 10 #4
by the end of class: hand in your completed Group Planning Guide, including written at the bottom the name of the group member having the completed code on Lesson 10 #4
